entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
